data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Biombo, Guinea-Bissau to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Biombo, Guinea-Bissau
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Biombo, Guinea-Bissau to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Biombo, Guinea-Bissau.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Biombo, Guinea-Bissau so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bambara people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
There are 69,800 people living in the state of Biombo. Only about 1,451 might be believers.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Biombo, Guinea-Bissau that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Biombo, Guinea-Bissau to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 68,348 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

location.name: Biombo
location.people_groups_list: Deaf, Nalu, Papel, Balanta, Nyakra, Fula Jalon
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Deaf (20,000), Nalu (11,000), Papel (174,000), Balanta, Nyakra (15,000), Fula Jalon (1,800)
